headline.main: PROGRAM DESIGNED TO AID PLANTS HERE; Johnson Says SWPC Plans May Start Flow of Orders Within Three Weeks TO ASSIST CONVERSIONS Loans Up to $25,000 to Be Made by Regional Officials to Change Over Shops

lead_paragraph: Establishment of a War Production Board test plan to aid small plants should start a flow of contracts to 893 distressed concerns in New York and Brooklyn within the next three weeks, Colonel Robert W. Johnson, vice chairman of the WPB and chairman of the Smaller War Plants Corporation, declared here yesterday at a press conference.
abstract: Gets lr from Col Johnson on SWPC plans
